h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fireproof Mantle Location
content: The Fireproof Mantle can be found upon ringing all three bells in Black Wind Mountain and defeating Elder Jinchi in the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple area (secret boss) in Black Wind Mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fireproof_Mantle.md', within the main section titled 'Fireproof Mantle', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fireproof Mantle Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Fireproof Mantle can be found upon ringing all three bells in Black Wind Mountain and defeating Elder Jinchi in the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple area (secret boss) in Black Wind Mountain.
